title: When I Laid the Earth's Foundation
credit_line: Gift of Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA. Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, by May 1956 until April 11, 1957 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, April 1957.

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal acquired the lithograph before May 1956. It appears on a list of Spruance prints (this one "bl & wh" with a valuation of $24?,) which were sent to Carnegie Institute at that time "For addition to other prints by Spruance."
[2]. The lithograph accessioned on April 11, 1957.
